mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_activity_type (title, sub_title, pay_type, detail_img, list_img, applicable_people, specific_location, expense_detail, preparation, hot_sale, recommend, new_sale, `enable`, `exclusive`, on_sale, activity_location, location_range, form, create_time, upper_and_lower_time, modify_time, creator, modifier, `level`, sale_num, view_num, mini_price, presell, complete_type, presell_content) values (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detailImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{listImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicablePeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specificLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expenseDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preparation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hotSale,jdbcType=BIT}, #{recommend,jdbcType=BIT}, #{newSale,jdbcType=BIT}, #{enable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{exclusive,jdbcType=BIT}, #{onSale,jdbcType=BIT}, #{activityLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locationRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{form,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{upperAndLowerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{saleNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{viewNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{miniPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{presell,jdbcType=BIT}, #{completeType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{presellContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_activity_type set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sub_title = #{subTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, detail_img = #{detailImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, list_img = #{listImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, applicable_people = #{applicablePeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, specific_location = #{specificLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expense_detail = #{expenseDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, preparation = #{preparation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hot_sale = #{hotSale,jdbcType=BIT}, recommend = #{recommend,jdbcType=BIT}, new_sale = #{newSale,jdbcType=BIT}, `enable` = #{enable,jdbcType=BIT}, `exclusive` = #{exclusive,jdbcType=BIT}, on_sale = #{onSale,jdbcType=BIT}, activity_location = #{activityLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location_range = #{locationRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, form = #{form,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, upper_and_lower_time = #{upperAndLowerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `level` = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sale_num = #{saleNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, view_num = #{viewNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mini_price = #{miniPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, presell = #{presell,jdbcType=BIT}, complete_type = #{completeType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, presell_content = #{presellContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, title, sub_title, pay_type, detail_img, list_img, applicable_people, specific_location, expense_detail, preparation, hot_sale, recommend, new_sale, `enable`, `exclusive`, on_sale, activity_location, location_range, form, create_time, upper_and_lower_time, modify_time, creator, modifier, `level`, sale_num, view_num, mini_price, presell, complete_type, presell_content from t_activity_type where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
